TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit OutputCache extends System.Object
public ref class OutputCache abstract sealed

summary.span: 提供以程式設計方式，存取網站組態檔中指定的輸出快取區提供者。

span.span: Provides programmatic access to the output-cache providers that are specified in the configuration file for a Web site.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 輸出快取在記憶體中儲存的頁面、 控制項和 HTTP 回應所產生的輸出。Output caching stores the generated output of pages, controls, and HTTP responses in memory. 輸出快取，可讓您快取不同版本的內容，根據查詢字串和表單張貼參數至頁面、 瀏覽器類型或使用者的語言。Output caching enables you to cache different versions of content depending on the query string and on form-post parameters to a page, on browser type, or on the language of the user. 您可以設定 ASP.NET 輸出快取項目快取一段特定時間。You can configure ASP.NET to cache an output-cache entry for a specific period. 您也可以設定 ASP.NET 收回快取項目會自動根據外部事件，例如快取取決於資料庫中的變更。You can also configure ASP.NET to evict a cache entry automatically based on an external event such as changes in the database that the cache depends on. 類別可讓您擴充輸出快取。The class enables you to extend output caching. 例如，您可以設定一或多個自訂輸出快取提供者為目標的其他存放裝置，例如本機或遠端磁碟、 資料庫、 雲端存放裝置和分散式快取引擎。For example, you can configure one or more custom output-cache providers that target other storage devices such as local or remote disks, databases, cloud storage, and distributed cache engines.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property DefaultProviderName As String
public: static property System::String ^ DefaultProviderName { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得設定用於輸出快取區的預設提供者名稱。

span.span: Gets the name of the default provider that is configured for the output cache.
The name of the default provider.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 根據預設，所有的 HTTP 回應，呈現頁面和控制項使用`AspNetInternalProvider`，記憶體中輸出快取提供者。By default, all HTTP responses, rendered pages, and controls use `AspNetInternalProvider`, the in-memory output cache provider. 若要使用不同的提供者，`defaultProvider`屬性設定為替代的提供者的名稱。To use a different provider, set the `defaultProvider` attribute to the name of the alternative provider.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig object Deserialize(class System.IO.Stream stream) cil managed

summary.span: 將二進位物件還原序列化為輸出快取區資料。

span.span: Deserializes a binary object into output-cache data.

returns.span: 物件，包含已還原序列化的資料。

span.span: An object that contains the deserialized data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks [!INCLUDE [untrusted-data-method-note](~/includes/untrusted-data-method-note.md)] 在部分信任下運作的輸出快取提供者會使用這個方法。This method is used by output-cache providers that are operating under partial trust.

exception.span: 還原序列化的物件是由不是有效輸出快取型別的方法所傳回。

span.span: The deserialized object that is returned by the method is not a valid output-cache type.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property Providers As OutputCacheProviderCollection

summary.span: 取得網站組態檔中指定的輸出快取區提供者集合。

span.span: Gets a collection of the output-cache providers that are specified in the configuration file for a Web site.

value.span: 已設定之提供者的集合。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您設定一或多個自訂輸出快取提供者為目標的其他存放裝置，例如本機或遠端磁碟、 資料庫、 雲端存放裝置和分散式快取引擎。You configure one or more custom output-cache providers that target other storage devices, such as local or remote disks, databases, cloud storage, and distributed cache engines. 若要設定自訂輸出快取提供者，您必須新增提供者集合所表示屬性。To configure custom output-cache providers, you add a provider to the collection that is represented by the property.

MemberSignature.Value: public static void Serialize (System.IO.Stream stream, object data);
.method public static hidebysig void Serialize(class System.IO.Stream stream, object data) cil managed
public: static void Serialize(System::IO::Stream ^ stream, System::Object ^ data);
static member Serialize : System.IO.Stream * obj -> unit

param.name: stream
param.span: 要包含已序列化之二進位資料的物件。

span.span: The object to contain the serialized binary data.

param.name: data
param.span: 要序列化的輸出快取區資料。

summary.span: 將輸出快取區資料序列化為二進位資料。

span.span: Serializes output-cache data into binary data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在部分信任下運作的輸出快取提供者會使用這個方法。This method is used by output-cache providers that are operating under partial trust.

exception.span: 不是其中一個指定的輸出快取型別。

span.span: is not one of the specified output-cache types.
